mapper.update: UPDATE p_order SET end_time=sysdate WHERE order_id=#{order_id}
UPDATE p_order SET order_done=1 WHERE order_id=#{order_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO p_order VALUES (seq_order_code.nextval,#{seat_num},#{id}, sysdate, sysdate+3/24, 0)
mapper.select: select * from p_order where seat_num=#{seat_num} order by order_time DESC
select f.food_name, count(f.food_name) food_num from p_order_menu o join p_food f on(o.food_code=f.food_code) where order_id = #{order_id} group by f.food_name
